nodes.text: Criax Thane was a male Cathar living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Asylum he traveled to Odessen and joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. He was assigned to the military branch of the Alliance under former Galactic Republic Admiral Bey'wan Aygo.
Criax Thane appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion as a vehicle vendor inside Odessen base.
